insurance.policies.basic.name: Tutorial
insurance.policies.basic.description: This basic insurance policy is as starter policy just enough to drive around with simple vehicles. You cannot customize its coverage much.
insurance.policies.daily_driver.name: Daily driver
insurance.policies.daily_driver.descript: Affordable coverage for everyday vehicles valued up to 80,000. Offers quick repair times, optional paint repairs, and roadside assistance. Deductibles range from 1% to 10% of the vehicle's value.
insurance.policies.prestige.name: Prestige
insurance.policies.prestige.description: Premium protection for high-end vehicles valued above 80,000. Enjoy faster repairs, comprehensive services, and lower deductibles from 0.5% to 2% of the vehicle's value. Ideal for luxury and high-performance cars
insurance.policies.commercial.name: Commercial
insurance.policies.commercial.descriptio: Specialized insurance for business vehicles. Covers trucks, vans, and other commercial vehicles with tailored options for repair times, paint repairs, and roadside assistance. Ensures your business keeps moving with minimal downtime.
insurance.perks.repairTime.name: Repair time
insurance.perks.repairTime.description: How long it would take to repair your vehicle.
insurance.perks.deductible.name: Deductible Percentage
insurance.perks.deductible.description: The percent of your vehicles value that you would have to pay to repair your vehicle.
insurance.perks.renewal.name: Renewal distance
insurance.perks.renewal.description: How often the policy cycle will occur.
insurance.perks.roadsideAssistance.name: Roadside assistance
insurance.perks.roadsideAssistance.descr: Allows you to have free roadside assistance such as towing your vehicle, flipping your vehicle
insurance.perks.paintRepair.name: Apply paint when repairing
insurance.perks.paintRepair.description: When repairing your vehicle, new parts will be properly painted.
insurance.repairOptions.quickRepair.name: Quick repair
missions.utah.timeTrial.rallystage.title: Prospector's Return
missions.utah.timeTrial.rallystage.descr: A technical rally stage that features the mine system.
missions.utah.timeTrial.rallystage.start: This is a long technical stage that takes you through a mine shaft section, watch out for the jump.
missions.east_coast_usa.timeTrial.mixedr: A rally stage with asphalt and gravel road sections.
This long technical stage will test all of your rally driving skills.  Good luck!
missions.johnson_valley.arrive.outlander: Drive the site manager's Roamer back to his cabin without damaging it.

The site manager got a bit excited after a few malt drinks last night and decided to go rock crawling in his wife's Roamer.  Luckily, some of the staff managed to get him out of the car before he got it stuck.  They got him home to bed and left the Roamer out in the desert.  Your job this morning is to get it back to the site manager's house, but do not damage it. Remember, it's his wife's car. You will not be popular if you damage it.
Get as many items to the finish as you can.

How much of the cafe clean up can you take down the mountain in one run? Lets find out.  You will have to take the dirt route since the main road down is close at the moment. Get to the entrance of the factory, they will take it from there.
missions.west_coast_usa.delivery.obstruc: Carefully drive through the highly obstructed road with a semi.
The road is under heavy work right now, but you need to get the supplies to the hospital as they are refitting.  Carefully navigate your way through the road works to the hospital.
missions.west_coast_usa.timeTrial.gearsp: Climb to the top of the hill as fast as you can.
Get to the top of the hill as quickly as you can.  You will need to make good use of the gearbox and drivetrain to get the fastest time.  The key is to avoid hitting the rev limiter at all times.
missions.west_coast_usa.arrive.Gas.title: Gas Runner
missions.west_coast_usa.arrive.Gas.descr: Deliver some contaminated fuel to the refinery.
missions.west_coast_usa.arrive.Gas.intro: This gas station was given some bad petroleum and it needs taking back to the refinery.
missions.johnson_valley.timeTrial.desert: A fast route across the desert in a rally car.
Keep your foot down and charge to the end of the route, located on the highway.
Deliver the shopfit supplies to the top of the hill.

The cafe on the hill is getting refitted, however the supply company dropped off all the equipment to the factory and left us to finish the delivery.  I guess that they couldn't handle the climb.  It looks like it's up to you.  Drive into the car park on your right and hook up the load, then follow the road to the top of the hill and drop off the supplies to the cafe.
missions.italy.delivery.abseilingfuel.de: Deliver a tanker of fuel to the bottom of the mountain.
missions.italy.delivery.abseilingfuel.in: Take the tanker down to the gas station which is situated next to the airport.  Take your time with the down hill sections and be sure to make use of your compression braking system.  This will stop your drum brakes from overheating and allow a more controlled way of maintaining your speed.  You can take a left or a right at the fork in the road, the choice is yours.  Be prepared to mount the curbs on the hairpins so take it steady.
missions.utah.delivery.desertdriver.desc: Deliver a container of engines to the autoshop.
missions.utah.delivery.desertdriver.intr: Your job for today is to deliver a container of engines down to the auto shop by the highway.  Leave the Information Center and pickup the container from the dealership down the road.  Make you way down the hill being careful not to overspeed, you can use your compression braking system to help control your speed when driving down a slope.  The garage would like you to reverse the trailer into the rear carpark when you arrive.
missions.industrial.delivery.shipmentshu: Find all the trailers and park them at the designated area.

Your job for today is to collect the three trailers that are parked around the port.  The large white beam will guide you to the location that we need you to park them in.  Cruise around the port, find the three trailers and back the three trailers into the target zone.
missions.west_coast_usa.drift.BelascoDri: A winding downhill run to the highway.
missions.west_coast_usa.drift.Portsidesl: A freestyle Gymkhana run around the Port.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Cliff.title: Cliff Road
missions.italy.timeTrial.Cliff.descripti: A dangerous road around the south half of the island, featuring steep cliffs and sharp corners.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Asphalt1.title: Asphalt Hillclimb 1
missions.italy.timeTrial.Asphalt1.descri: A narrow climb to the castle village on a twisty road with 10 hairpins.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Asphalt2.title: Asphalt Hillclimb 2
missions.italy.timeTrial.Asphalt2.descri: A twisty climb going through the mountain village.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Gravel1.title: Gravel Hillclimb 1
missions.italy.timeTrial.Gravel1.descrip: A 4km long climb from the fields to the mountain side, consisting of 98% gravel 2% asphalt.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Gravel2.title: Gravel Hillclimb 2
missions.italy.timeTrial.Gravel2.descrip: A 6.2km long climb to the top of the mountain. The road is 90% gravel and 10% asphalt, with many hairpins and deadly cliffs.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Highway.title: Highway
missions.italy.timeTrial.Highway.descrip: A fast 4-lanes road on the local highway. Ideal for fast vehicles.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Island.title: Island Tour
missions.italy.timeTrial.Island.descript: This long circuit around the whole island features a long stretch of highway and some cliffside roads with a great view.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Mini.title: Mini Village Loop
missions.italy.timeTrial.Mini.descriptio: This short circuit is located in one of the small and narrow villages on the island.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Mixed1.title: Mixed Circuit 1
missions.italy.timeTrial.Mixed1.descript: Stretching around Italy's fields and river, this 4.4 km long circuit consists of 50% gravel and 50% asphalt.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Mixed2.title: Mixed Hillclimb 1
missions.italy.timeTrial.Mixed2.descript: The length of 7.2km and its many hairpins make this climb from sea level to the mountaintop a difficult track. The roads are 75% asphalt and 25% gravel.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Mountian.title: Mountain Village Circuit
missions.italy.timeTrial.Mountian.descri: Explore the narrow cobble roads of the Mountain Village in this scenic circuit.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Port.title: Port Gymkhana
missions.italy.timeTrial.Port.descriptio: A tight, narrow autocross through the cluttered port area.
missions.italy.timeTrial.Through.title: Through the Centre
missions.italy.timeTrial.Through.descrip: An agility track through the centre of Norte. An agile and not low-sitting vehicle is recommended.
missions.jungle_rock_island.timeTrial.Is: A long loop around the island, mostly composed of dirt roads.
missions.jungle_rock_island.timeTrial.Hi: A rough asphalt road to the top of the mountain. Sharp turns and dangerous cliffs all around.
missions.jungle_rock_island.timeTrial.Mo: An asphalt stage up one side of the mountain and down the other.
missions.jungle_rock_island.timeTrial.Pe: This winding asphalt stage leads you around the big peninsula of the island.
missions.jungle_rock_island.timeTrial.Po: This wild time trial weaves in and around the abandoned port. Get that vehicle rotating around the obstacles for the best time.
missions.jungle_rock_island.timeTrial.Di: A rough dirt stage through the overgrown jungles of the island, finishing in the abandoned port.
missions.jungle_rock_island.timeTrial.Is: A long asphalt loop around the perimeter of the island. Faster and less technical than other routes on the island.
missions.jungle_rock_island.timeTrial.Di: This stage covers faster dirt roads alongside the central mountain of the island.
missions.west_coast_usa.timeTrial.Cell.d: Drive from one cell tower to the other. Make sure that you don't fall off the hills!
missions.west_coast_usa.timeTrial.Street: Narrow curves and steep slopes lead you on a race through the city.
Drive along the water on this race through the city and the harbor.
missions.west_coast_usa.timeTrial.Highwa: With over ten miles of straights and high-speed sweepers, you'd better bring some tall gears to this circuit.
A race around the highway intersection, combining fast straights and tight corners.
Reach top speed on this one mile long highway strip!
missions.west_coast_usa.timeTrial.Mounta: Drive on the mountain roads of West Coast USA.
The big race track just outside the city.
missions.west_coast_usa.timeTrial.Altern: An alternate layout of the big race track just outside the city.
The big race track just outside the city, short version.
The big race track just outside the city, with a chicane in the middle of the long straight. Ideal for slower vehicles.
missions.west_coast_usa.timeTrial.OffRoa: This figure eight dirt track features multiple jumps, rough terrain and uneven ground.
missions.automation_test_track.timeTrial: A circuit around the narrow, technical handling course.
A harrowing ride along the cliffs and around the switchbacks of the mountain.
A twisty climb on gravel roads.
A 7.8km endurance rally up and down the mountain.
A full circuit around the Automation Test Track.
A short layout around the Automation Test Track.
A circuit using an old track road, featuring a concrete banked turn.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.Containerl: A very difficult and technical course with a lot of verticality
A challenging lap around the outside of the container area requiring precise driving.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.Figure.des: A gravel and asphalt figure eight layout.
A gravel and asphalt layout following the perimeter.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.Short.desc: A short gravel and asphalt layout.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.Sprint1.de: A longer gravel and asphalt layout.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.West.title: West Mixed Circuit
missions.industrial.timeTrial.West.descr: A layout using only the asphalt section of the Mixed Circuit.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.Figure1.de: A figure eight layout in the old industrial area.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.High.title: High Speed Industrial Course
missions.industrial.timeTrial.High.descr: The fastest layout in the industrial area.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.Long.title: Long Industrial Course
missions.industrial.timeTrial.Long.descr: The longest layout in the industrial area.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.Sprint2.de: A short, winding layout in the industrial area.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.Curved.des: Like the perimeter circuit but incorporates the chicane.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.Long1.desc: The longest layout, incorporates the inner circuit.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.Perimeter1: A faster layout following the perimeter.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.West1.desc: A layout on the west portion.
A technical race through an abandoned industrial complex.
missions.gridmap_v2.timeTrial.Halfpipes1: Slim, straight segments and ramps make this difficult course perfect for vehicles with good handling and strong acceleration.
missions.gridmap_v2.timeTrial.Halfpipes2: Swing back and forth in this short but challenging track.
missions.gridmap_v2.timeTrial.Halfpipes3: Don't get dizzy in this loopy track below the map.
missions.gridmap_v2.timeTrial.Highspeed1: Select the fastest vehicle you can and race around the whole map in this long track with lots of banked turns.
missions.gridmap_v2.timeTrial.Highspeed2: Get to top speeds in this short oval track.
missions.gridmap_v2.timeTrial.Easy.title: Easy Skycurve
missions.gridmap_v2.timeTrial.Easy.descr: Enjoy the scenery while swaying through the gentle curves of this track.
missions.gridmap_v2.timeTrial.Fast.title: Fast Skycurve
missions.gridmap_v2.timeTrial.Fast.descr: Make sure to not fall of the track when trying this difficult, fast-paced skycurve.
missions.gridmap_v2.timeTrial.Medium.des: Race through the loop on this medium difficulty skycurve.
missions.east_coast_usa.timeTrial.Backro: A long course of mixed dirt and asphalt roads. It's best to choose a vehicle that is at home with both surfaces.
missions.east_coast_usa.timeTrial.Defore: A short dirt stage in the deforested area of the map. Watch out for fallen trees and stumps on the roadside.
missions.east_coast_usa.timeTrial.High.d: A loop made of straight road sections allowing for very high speeds. Brake heavily before the corners to avoid flying off the road.
missions.east_coast_usa.timeTrial.Offroa: A narrow trail through dirt, gravel, rocks and boulders. A good place to take a vehicle with four wheel drive and decent ground clearance.
missions.east_coast_usa.timeTrial.Asphal: An asphalt stage on countryside roads of on east coast of the United States. Suitable for a variety of vehicles.
An asphalt stage on countryside roads of on east coast of the United States. Suitable for a variety of vehicles.
missions.east_coast_usa.timeTrial.Sawmil: Short course through the sawmill dirty paths.
Long course through the sawmill dirty paths.
A short street stage winding through the town. The stage contains sharp corners and shortcuts over the pavement.
A short street course winding through the town. Be sure to not hit the traffic barrels!
missions.derby.timeTrial.Oval.title: Dirt oval
missions.derby.timeTrial.Big.title: The Big 8
missions.derby.timeTrial.Big.description: A fast track with banked turns and 2 jumps. Recommended jump speed is 100km/h. Powerful cars with soft suspensions are advised.
missions.small_island.timeTrial.IRS1.des: This short stage runs over unmaintained asphalt and gravel roads.
missions.small_island.timeTrial.IRS2.des: This longer stage runs over asphalt, gravel, and some beach sand.
missions.small_island.timeTrial.IRS3.des: This very long stage challenges with narrow dirt roads over the rocky center of the island.
An alternative route around the island.
missions.small_island.timeTrial.mountain: This track leads you up and down the mountain. Expect tricky rocks and steep slopes!
missions.utah.timeTrial.Asphalt.title: Asphalt Hillclimb
missions.utah.timeTrial.Asphalt.descript: A fast-paced asphalt climb to the top of the mesa.
missions.utah.timeTrial.Mixed.title: Road Course 1
missions.utah.timeTrial.Mixed.descriptio: A course composed of of 2-lane highway and narrow asphalt backroads. Suitable for a variety of vehicles.
missions.utah.timeTrial.Canyon.title: Mixed Stage 1
missions.utah.timeTrial.Canyon.descripti: This stage begins in narrow canyonside roads, then descends to a dirt section, with a final stretch on the highway.
missions.utah.timeTrial.Dead.title: Dead Man's Loop
missions.utah.timeTrial.Dead.description: A mostly gravel loop along some dangerous cliffs.
missions.utah.timeTrial.Old.title: Old Mill Loop
missions.utah.timeTrial.Old.description: A Gravel loop around mesas and canyons starting at the old mill.
missions.utah.timeTrial.River.title: River Rally
missions.utah.timeTrial.River.descriptio: A fast-paced rally along the river, featuring many water crossings.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.PortTT.des: A tight time trial around the port.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.PortTT.sta: Keep on your toes for this technical course through the port.
missions.west_coast_usa.collection.downt: Collect all the cash bags from around the downtown area.
Grab all the cash bags from around the city!
missions.derby.aiRace.Flag.title: Flag Pole Derby
missions.derby.aiRace.Flag.description: An oval race with an inloop.
missions.utah.collection.G500Campsite.de: Collection across the desert from the camp site.
missions.utah.collection.G500Campsite.in: After a mass trash bagging around the site, the bags need collecting quickly before the coach of campers arrive.
missions.utah.timeTrial.G500Gambler.desc: A timed circuit race on mixed surfaces.
missions.utah.timeTrial.G500Gambler.star: In this timed run you will need to make two laps of the circuit. There is a section of fast asphalt, so prepare for some varied traction.
missions.small_island.collection.G500Pol: A technical collection of trash bags at the port.
The port has been hand cleaned and the bags are ready to assemble. Hurry though, there is a boat show starting here any moment.
missions.industrial.timeTrial.G500Catwal: A technical time trial circuit with a twist, turns and a jump.
Will you take on the catwalk? This course will take you through the tank farm without ease.
missions.small_island.timeTrial.G500Gamb: Two laps of the inner loop here on the island is order of the day. Maintaining speed as much as possible will be imperative to a good result.
A high speed collection, spanned over two neighboring race tracks.
A large track invasion after the glorious victory of a local driver has left the whole facility in a mess. Now that everything is bagged, we need it cleared before today's operations begin.
missions.small_island.delivery.G500Wreck: Deliver an abandoned covet to the port on a trailer.

This thing has been sitting up here for seven years now. It's high time that it was dealt with and taken to be shipped off of the island to a scrap yard. Carefully traverse the hill and get it to the boat.
missions.east_coast_usa.timeTrial.G500Cu: A short, technical run through the woods in the Poogeon.
This run will give you wings, if you are brave enough.
missions.small_island.timeTrial.G500Roug: A short, technical and rocky hotlap spot.
Although not long, this route will fight back if you aren't prepared for some tight gaps and large bumps.
missions.small_island.scatterPickup.G500: Pick up trash that's been left over the island.

Oh no! The island is full of trash. Thankfully, volunteers have already gathered most of it and put it on big piles so it's easier to transport. Drive around and fill your car up with trash as quickly as possible!
missions.east_coast_usa.scatterPickup.G5: The town has just had a large festival and now that it's over. There is a great deal of trash to deal with. Do what you can.
missions.johnson_valley.timeTrial.G500Tr: A timed run on the shortcourse circuit.
Take the car to edge of traction and get it around the course as fast as you can.
missions.industrial.delivery.G500Motor.d: Deliver a dangerous load of junk.
missions.industrial.delivery.G500Motor.i: A lot of old parts were found at the container land zone. Get as much of it to the port as you can.
missions.johnson_valley.scatterPickup.G5: Gather old debris from the desert.
It's been a long time since anyone cleared up out there and people have been seen tipping their old building scrap and general trash in various places near this settlement. Gather as much as you can.
missions.johnson_valley.timeTrial.G500To: A long stage on the toughest roads of the desert.
This route will be very tough on the car. A mix of focus and mechanical sympathy will be important here.
missions.jungle_rock_island.timeTrial.G5: Get to the bottom of the muddy slope.
This stage is not for the faint of heart. Wrestle the Covet to the bottom of the hill on very slippery roads.
missions.jungle_rock_island.aiRace.G500j: An end to end race through tough jungle terrain.
Battle your way through the jungle and down the beach.
missions.jungle_rock_island.timeTrial.G5: A rough road with the Poogeon.
Rocks, mud and trees make this route very technical. Carrying speed is the key to a good time.
missions.jungle_rock_island.delivery.G50: Deliver a bunch of old engines.

We found these old engines down in the viaduct. The team at the airfield want a crack at getting them going again for some kind of crafts they are building. Get them over there without losing them. Chop chop, you are late!
missions.west_coast_usa.timeTrial.Spearl: A route around the outside of Spearleaf Island.
Keep your speed up for this technical ring road.
missions.west_coast_usa.collection.Stole: Collect all the steel parts from around the foundry.
Collect all of the steel parts!
missions.west_coast_usa.collection.speed: Speed through downtown Belasco City and collect as many markers as you can!
Collect markers at the downtown intersections before time runs out. Drive fast, but watch out for traffic!
missions.heistM.italy.title: Il furto di Castelleto
missions.heistM.italy.description: Prepare and carry out a heist mission in one of the spots marked. Steal a vehicle, go to the marked spot and escape.
missions.heistM.italy.startDescription:
Prepare and carry out a robbery in one of the points marked by the bosses in this level.
Steal a vehicle located near the start, go to the marked place
 where the robbery will take place and escape to the place marked as the escape point.
 Throughout the mission you will be a suspect for the police,
 so try to be as discreet as possible or evade the police before continuing with the mission
missions.heistM.attemptDescription:
This is the summary of the mission lads.

 -Steal the marked vehicle at {{start}}, we will use that for the heist.
 -Drive to the heist spot at {{heist}}.
 -If the heist goes wrong, escape from the police and reach the escape point at {{escape}}.
 Try to avoid the police as much as possible, if they see us we will have to loose them before continue with the plan.
missions.heistM.endTitle: The heist has been a success!
missions.heistM.failTitle: The police have managed to stop the heist.
missions.heistM.goto: Find a place to wait until the heist is complete.
missions.heistM.findPlace: Find a place to wait until the heist is complete.
missions.heistM.wait: Wait until the heist is done.
missions.heistM.greatHeist: The heist has been a success, time to go to the meeting point.
missions.heistM.badHeist: The heist has been a failure, the police are on their way, loose them and then go to the meeting point.
missions.heistM.descriptionAbandon: Do you want to abandon the mission?
missions.driver_training.training_beginn: The start of the Driver Training Campaign. Simply drive a short distance.

Welcome to the ETK Driver Experience Center. Let's start out nice and easy - all you have to do is drive over to the other parking spot and stop there.
Be gentle with the throttle and slow a bit before you turn.
Looks like you know the very basics already. Lets get to some cornering next.
missions.driver_training.training_accele: Accelerate and come to a full stop.

For this challenge, you have accelerate, and then stop before you hit the barriers. Make sure you accelerate and brake hard, because the time limit is pretty tight with this one. Brake when you reach the stop signs!
So you can drive like a pro in a straight line? Good for you!
Too slow! You'll actually have to use your accelerator pedal for this test.
where are you going? The test area is in the other direction!
That'll buff out. Give it another try and please be more careful!
missions.driver_training.training_corner: In the unlikely event that the road is not straight, you may need to stop accelerating and use your vehicle's steering wheel. [br][br]Try it here on the roundabout, but watch out for the slippery area.
Nice turn. It's time to get you onto a proper road now.
I want to see you drive faster than that.
Looks like you might be running wide on the turn. Take it slower if you need to.
Staying off the grass would be a good start.
missions.driver_training.training_tightr: A tight wavy road. Don't cut corners!
Next up there will be a few more turns, on a narrow road. Try to find the proper speed for those tight corners. Again, try to slow down going into a corner. Don't hit any pylons!
Good job! I think it's time to make you drive a real vehicle.
If you're going to travel that slow, I don't think a vehicle is even necessary.
You hit a marker - I put them there to stop you cutting corners, you know.
The roads aren't a suggestion, buddy!
missions.driver_training.training_lanech: Changing lanes at highway speeds requires a gentle hand on the steering wheel. Be careful - you need to accelerate quickly and drive fast, but the road is very narrow. Make sure to not hit any cones. Do you have what it takes to control an 80s supercar?
Well done! The Civetta Bolide can be a tricky vehicle for beginners.
You're supposed to be driving at highway speeds, aren't you?
I see a cone knocked over... that means you went outside the track!
Our insurance isn't going to be happy about this.
missions.driver_training.training_corner: Learn about appropriate speeds for curves.
You can't take just any corner at any speed: stick to the speed limits on the signs to guarantee your success.
Good job! I see you've grasped the concept of managing speed while cornering.
Looks like you're driving a lot slower than what your vehicle is capable of.
You hit a cone. Try to stay inside the rumble strips.
Cars tend to corner worse after they've been smashed against walls.
missions.driver_training.training_easyci: I've set up a circuit for you to practice what you've learned. Should be pretty easy: 2 laps, no surprises.
Well done! You've passed the basic component of this course. Now we can move on to some more advanced driving techniques. There's a bunch of different courses you can try around the map now.
That's a bit too slow - don't be afraid to push the vehicle more!
You hit a cone, precision is key in racing. Try again.
This vehicle is going to need some repair work.
missions.driver_training.training_hairpi: Turn your vehicle around quickly in limited space.
How do you turn the vehicle around quickly in a tiny space? Pull the handbrake to slide round a hairpin, just like in the movies.
I've got to admit, that looked pretty cool.
Time's up! You'll have to finish quicker than that.
You didn't quite make that turn cleanly - I see you've bumped an obstacle.
Er, do we need to go back to lesson one?
missions.driver_training.training_slalom: A slalom course is a hard thing to master. Get a feel for the weight of the vehicle as you weave between the cones
Well done! You dodged those cones like a pro.
Too slow! A slalom course is only challenging at speed.
You bumped a cone back there, have another try.
Guess I should have set the barriers up further away!
missions.driver_training.training_rwd.in: The Bruckell Moonhawk handles like a boat, so if you can finish a lap of this circuit first try, you're doing better than most of my students.
missions.driver_training.training_rwd.de: Great job! You are really getting the hang of this.
missions.driver_training.training_rwd.no: Watch those cones! Remember this vehicle doesn't quite handle as well as some of the others you've driven.
missions.driver_training.training_rwd.ti: This vehicle has a V8 engine with plenty of power... use it!
missions.driver_training.training_rwd.da: This vehicle is definitely going to need some work done before it's drivable again.
missions.driver_training.training_advanc: You made that last course look too easy, so I've set up a circuit with 4 of the most difficult turns I could think of. Good luck, you're going to need it!
I'm amazed you did it! Now let's finish off this training course with something fun.
Not fast enough - I know you can do better than that.
You hit a cone - if you're skidding off the track, try reducing your speed on corner entry.
Nasty crash there, you OK? Looks like the vehicle's out of action.
missions.driver_training.diffs.title: Differentials
missions.driver_training.diffs.descripti: Learn how to get up steep terrain.
missions.driver_training.diffs.intro:
Try to climb over the obstacles made from concrete pipes. To get over it, you need to lock the front and rear differentials. This will force the left and right wheels to rotate at the same speed, letting each wheel apply as much rotational force as the traction under it will allow.
Additionally, you want to set your rangebox to low mode, giving you a lot more torque on the driveshaft, but lower top speeds.
missions.driver_training.diffs.defaultWi: Great job! Always remember to set up your vehicle to the task at hand.
missions.driver_training.diffs.timeLimit: Not fast enough - Try to use the throttle gently so you don't bounce all over the place.
missions.driver_training.wetcorner.title: Wet Corner
missions.driver_training.wetcorner.descr: Experience Anti-Lock-Braking and ESC on wet surfaces.
missions.driver_training.wetcorner.intro:
Drive along the course with your right wheels on the slippery surface and your left wheels on the asphalt. Try to stay centered and don't hit any cones!
You will notice that even when braking slightly, the vehicle will not spin out - the anti-lock braking system (ABS) is kicking in and stopping the wheels from locking completely. It is also visible in the tacho ui.
You can also try switching off your electronic stability control (ESC) - it also supports your vehicle in not spinning out.
missions.driver_training.wetcorner.defau: Great job! Always remember to set up your vehicle to the task at hand.
missions.driver_training.wetcorner.timeL: Not fast enough - Try to use the throttle gently so you don't bounce all over the place.
missions.driver_training.wetcorner.nomov: You hit a cone - if you're skidding off the track, try reducing your speed and braking very softly.
missions.driver_training.drift001.title: Gymkhana Test Course
missions.driver_training.drift001.descri: Learn how to do simple drifts.
missions.driver_training.drift001.intro:
In this short drift training, you need to do one perpendicular drift and one donut, then go through the goal, all within 20 seconds.
Tips:
  • Accelerate strongly and use the handbrake briefly, then turn right or left to slightly give your vehicle a spin.
  • Use throttle and steering while sliding to adjust the angle of your vehicle.
  • Gain at least 9000 points for the gold medal.
Good Luck!
missions.driver_training.drift001.wood: Drifting is difficult. It's all a matter of knowing when to use the handbrake, when to release it, and the same goes for the pedals.
missions.driver_training.drift001.bronze: You are going somewhere. Try getting a tighter donut and a tighter angle in general.
missions.driver_training.drift001.silver: It seems like you know the basics. Now it's only a matter of attempting again.
missions.driver_training.drift001.gold: That was perfect! Now you are ready to practice on narrower, more difficult roads.
missions.driver_training.drift002.title: Freeform Gymkhana
missions.driver_training.drift002.descri: The perfect playground for drifting. Big clear area, no risks, only fun. You should experiment with different types of vehicles in order to learn how each one of them handles.
missions.driver_training.drift002.win: There's no loser here. We're here to train, to experiment and get better.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.gm_racetest.des: A short series of small jumps
scenarios.east_coast_usa.tanker_delivery: Deliver a tanker trailer with your Gavril T-Series to the garage on the other side of town.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.police_patrol.d: Stop the speeding Hirochi SBR4 with your much slower Gavril Roamer Sheriff Edition.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.hidden_jump_a.d: Master a hidden jump through the trees in a Gavril Roamer. Careful control of speed and placement is required to survive the jump and make it to the checkpoint.
Use your Gavril T-Series to deliver a couple of valuable classic supercars to a house in the town. Whatever you do, don't damage the vehicles.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.deliverytruck_t: Stop the fleeing delivery truck in your Gavril Grand Marshal police car!
You got too far away from the suspect
scenarios.east_coast_usa.pessima_test.de: A fun time trial to introduce the 1996 Ibishu Pessima.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.destroy_the_car: Destroy the Bruckell Moonhawk, no matter what it takes.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.minimum_speed.d: Use your old and broken Gavril T-Series to deliver some concrete for the very last time.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.bank_robbery.de: You got a report about a bank robbery in your local town. Respond to the report and stop the fleeing suspect before he reaches his hideout.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.bank_robbery.lo: You got lost on the way to the bank
scenarios.east_coast_usa.intro_road_race: A race through the countryside on east coast of the United States.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.offroad_ds_cour: Narrow bumpy track progressing in difficulty.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.town_course_sho: Another short rally sprint around the town.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.east_coast_chas:
A wanted individual has been spotted near the sawmill in a Gavril Barstow.

Drive to the location, and stop it!
The fugitive got too far, you lost them..
Your vehicle is nearly totaled, it cannot continue the chase..
Somebody just robbed the local gas station. Witnesses say they were seen leaving in a Soliad Wendover. Find and arrest them!
Your vehicle has received too much damage, it cannot continue the chase..
All of this for stealing a bag of chips..
We received reports of a reckless driver in a custom Bruckell Legran. Stop it!
The Legran got too far, you lost it..
Your vehicle has received too much damage, it cannot continue the chase..
Good job, one less reckless driver on the roads
BeamCom still hasn't fixed the internet at the police station. No more waiting on hold, it's time to convince them in person. Stop the van.
The van got too far, you lost it..
Your vehicle has received too much damage..
Your vehicle is trashed, and our internet is still not working!
Well done, hopefully they do something more than turning off and on the modem!
scenarios.east_coast_usa.jump_course.des:
Gavril Motors has sponsored a stunt driving event to showcase the strength of their new D25 model.

Stunt jumps have been placed along the course. You will be given points the bigger your jumps will be. You have no time limit, but try to keep the pace up!
scenarios.east_coast_usa.jump_course.gol: Your run has been exceptional, and you also got maximum score for those jumps! Well done!
scenarios.east_coast_usa.jump_course.sil: Nice driving, although you did not reach the target score for those jumps.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.high_speed_high: Blast through the rural highways in a twin turbo monster.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.rallycross_nd_l: A Rallycross course with a mix of asphalt and dirty roads.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.town_course_sho: A short rally sprint around the town.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.intro_road_race: A race through the countryside of the east coast of the United States.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.car_delivery.de: You've got an expensive sports car loaded up on your Gavril T-Series, take it to the new owner in the countryside.
scenarios.east_coast_usa.dirt_hopper.des: A short dirt time trial to introduce the Ibishu Hopper.
scenarios.gridmap.slalom.title: Slalom Trial
scenarios.gridmap.slalom.description: Weave back and forth between the blocks in an Ibishu Covet. Keep the speed steady and manage the cars balance with steering and throttle.
scenarios.gridmap.corridor.title: Corridor
scenarios.gridmap.corridor.description: A truck is heading your way, and your little Ibishu Pigeon is trapped in a small corridor. Find a way to survive!
scenarios.gridmap.gm_racetest.title: Gridmap Quickrace Test
scenarios.gridmap.gm_racetest.descriptio: A short series of small jumps.
scenarios.gridmap.gm_jumps.title: Jump Trial
scenarios.gridmap.gm_jumps.description: This trial sends you over a series of small jumps in an Ibishu Covet. The right speed makes all the difference.
scenarios.gridmap.hard_parking.title: Hard Parking
scenarios.gridmap.hard_parking.descripti: Parallel park as quickly as possible by sliding between two cars.
scenarios.gridmap.gm_skycurve1.title: Sky Curve 1
scenarios.gridmap.gm_skycurve1.descripti: Drive a Hirochi Sunburst RS on Sky Curve!
scenarios.gridmap.gm_ds_offroad_shortcou: 3 sets of off-road challenges, can the Gavril D15 take it?
scenarios.gridmap.gm_ds_large_jumps.desc: Take an off-road spec Gavril H15 for one hell of a ride.
scenarios.gridmap.gm_suspension_race.des: This trial leads you back and forth over the 4 different suspension test patterns in a Gavril Roamer. It's a great way to ruin the alignment.
scenarios.gridmap.gm_intersection_1.desc: Calibrate your speed in the tunnel and try to hit the other vehicle as it crosses the exit.
scenarios.gridmap.gm_skycurve2.title: Sky Curve 2
scenarios.gridmap.gm_skycurve2.descripti: Drive a Civetta Bolide 390GTR on Sky Curve 2!
scenarios.gridmap.gm_intersection_2.desc: Calibrate your speed and try to hit the other vehicle. This time with a twist!
scenarios.gridmap.fg-bowling.title: Bowling
scenarios.gridmap.fg-bowling.description: Play a round of bowling with the Pigeon.
scenarios.gridmap.fg-bowling.intro: Welcome to bowling with the Pigeon! You have 5 tries to knock over as many barrels as you can. Pressing the start button below will load the Pigeon and the pins, which will take a short amount of time. Have fun!
scenarios.gridmap.fg-bowling.forfeit: Press Reset ([action=reset_physics]) again to forfeit this attempt.
scenarios.gridmap.fg-bowling.restart: Press Reset ([action=reset_physics]) to start another round.
scenarios.gridmapv2.mountain.title: Collect Mountain
scenarios.gridmapv2.mountain.shortDesc: Collect 15 markers with a Hopper. Use as few resets as possible for the highest score!
scenarios.gridmapv2.mountain.desc:
Collect all 15 markers on the mountain! You can use reset[action=reset_physics] to the last marker you collected. Use as few resets as possible to get the highest score:
  • 0 resets: Gold
  • 5 or less resets: Silver
  • 20 or less resets: Bronze
Tips:
  • There are multiple paths you can take.
  • It can help to switch the rangebox or differentials to clear some paths more easily.
  • Take it slow and keep an eye on the pitch and roll apps.
  • You can pause the simulation using [action=pause] to check out the marker positions.
Good luck!
scenarios.gridmapv2.mountain.resultGold: You did it! You collected all markers without a single reset. You are surely a master of the Hopper. Well done!
scenarios.gridmapv2.mountain.resultSilve: You did it! You collected all markers, while only using very few resets. You seem to be pretty experienced with the hopper already. Well done!
scenarios.gridmapv2.mountain.resultBronz: You did it! Even after using a handful of resets, you managed to collect all markers. Well done!
scenarios.gridmapv2.mountain.resultWood: You did it! You used a lot of retries, but still made it to the top, which is by itself already very difficult. Well done!
missions.johnson_valley.timeTrial.Aurata: You are invited to test out the Aurata on a tough trail.

Attempt to successfully navigate this Sports Turbo spec Aurata UTV to the trail's end. Take special care in the middle section of the trial. For an added challenge, experiment with the reverse configuration.
missions.west_coast_usa.collection.Super: Race down the highway collecting markers.
Get to the end grabbing as many markers as you can before the timer runs out!
missions.jungle_rock_island.timeTrial.Mu: A long and very muddy trail in the Wild Aurata.
Is mud your thing?  This long, challenging trail in the Aurata may change your mind.
missions.automation_test_track.collectio: Collect the goodies from the dark woods.
If you go into the woods today, you may find and array of surprise.  Retrieve the BeamNGs from the woods.
missions.automation_test_track.timeTrial: A realistic length, mixed surface, rally stage.
This rally stage will test the most dedicated of drivers.  Taking advantage of the great features on this map, this route is fast, tight and full of danger.
Congratulations! How much time can you take off next time?
missions.automation_test_track.aiRace.ma: Take on the field of sports models for the showdown of the best.
missions.automation_test_track.collectio: Retrieve all of the engine parts that have been left around the grounds by a failed burglary.
missions.automation_test_track.crawl.cli: Can you make this trail to the top?

Your goal is to reach the end of the crawling course. If you leave the area for 5 seconds, you will fail the mission.
Reaching a [color=#ffff00][b]yellow checkpoint [/color][/b] will create a new recovery position. Use [action=reset_physics] or the Menu to recover to your latest recovery position. You can restart the mission by resetting again after recovery, or using the Menu.
missions.automation_test_track.timeTrial: Take on this technical hill top test track.
missions.johnson_valley.crawl.Van.title: Van der Waals' Vertigo
missions.johnson_valley.crawl.Van.descri: Can you make the Geko stick?
missions.johnson_valley.crawl.Van.startS: Take this route to the top and back.  Try to keep it on all four wheels!
missions.johnson_valley.crawl.Bootlegger: A tough long crawl to a disclosed location.
Take the old smugglers route to the stash, or can you?
missions.johnson_valley.crawl.Out.title: Out of Scale
missions.johnson_valley.crawl.Out.startS: Follow the route up the steep face.  Keep your whits about you in case the vehicle rolls over backwards.
missions.johnson_valley.crawl.Ridgeway.d: A crawl on the edge of comfort.
missions.johnson_valley.crawl.Ridgeway.s: Take the rocky ridge to the top for a glorious view.
missions.johnson_valley.crawl.Rinky.star: Take this crawler's introduction trail to get a brief feel for what crawling is all about on this kind of terrain.
Cross the shrublands and the desert to get to the fuel station.

A lenient course across the shrublands. Keep inside the zone and make your way to the fuel station at the far side of the map. Drive carefully, the hills and shrubs can throw your vehicle out of balance or slow you down.
Cross the whole map - dunes, hills and shrublands.

A moderate course across the map. Keep inside the zone and drive all the way across the desert, hills and shrublands to the other side. Drive carefully, the distance can be deceiving - it's much further than you think!
Find your own way across the mountains.
This freeform crawl will force you to scale the toughest cut through the mountains of Johnson Valley. Keep inside the zone and plan your route carefully!
Collect all the crates in the camp.
Collect all the crates in the camp as quickly as possible!
missions.johnson_valley.collection.Rocks: Collect all the markers on the hill as quickly as possible!
Collect them all before the time runs out! Don't forget to engage your differential locks and low range gear to help you traverse the terrain.
missions.johnson_valley.collection.Mojav: Collect all the markers before the timer runs out!

As a new recruit for the local emergency response team, you must pass the vehicle training exercise. Traverse the area in search of the markers. Be careful when you advance through the larger rocks; the fire truck may be powerful, but it is also very heavy. Good luck and watch out!
missions.johnson_valley.collection.Dusty: Collect all the markers as fast as possible.
This quick-fire desert collection challenge will test your maneuverability.
missions.johnson_valley.collection.Fortu: Collect the gold from the hills.
Scour the valleys for markers and try to get them all without running out of recoveries. Do not forget to engage your differential locks and low range gear to help you traverse the terrain.
Grab all the fuel cans as fast as you can.

The new employee at the race course forgot to tie down a load of fuel cans, and they were tossed out of his truck and strewn around this area. The employees only noticed the hazard once they got back to the race location. Luckily, someone else saw it happening from a distance and called it in. The worst part is, the fuel was being delivered for a race that is starting in the next hour! We need that fuel collected quickly so that it can be lifted over to the race in time! Good luck and get a move on!
missions.johnson_valley.chase.chase1.sta: There has been a report of someone rooting through the remote pit station.  Go check it out.
missions.johnson_valley.chase.chase1.dis: You lost track of the suspect!
missions.johnson_valley.chase.chase1.dam: You got too much damage to continue!
missions.johnson_valley.chase.chase1.hid: The suspect arrived at their secret hideout!
missions.johnson_valley.aiRace.smallshor: Race the AI on the small config of the short course.
missions.johnson_valley.aiRace.bigshortc: We're ready to start the race!
missions.johnson_valley.aiRace.race1.des: Last one back to the paddock has to buy the food!
missions.johnson_valley.aiRace.race1.sta: The gang wants to race back to the paddock. Apparently, last one back has to buy the chili dogs.
missions.johnson_valley.hypermiling.midd: Can you get the workers' truck out of trouble?
One of the race marshals ran out of fuel while working far off the main road. You have only brought enough fuel to make it a short distance. Can you help?
missions.johnson_valley.timeTrial.Shortc: Small config of the short course.
Get ready for the short course track!
Alternate small config of the short course.
Take on the alternate small config of the short course.
Large config of the short course.
Take on the large config of the short course track.
missions.johnson_valley.timeTrial.enduro: Can you survive the deep desert?
Take the ring road around the Johnson Valley area. You will need to traverse the desert but you will not encounter many rocks.
missions.johnson_valley.timeTrial.Broken: A high-speed blast down the main road.
Make a high-speed run down the main road.
missions.johnson_valley.timeTrial.rally1: Take this fearsome route to the center of the map. You will need some serious kit if you want to achieve a respectable time.

Calamity Peak is a treacherous mountain, but that doesn't mean it can't be conquered! Weave your way through exhilarating desert race track around the mountain and get to the checkpoints as quick as you can.
Congratulations! You've conquered the Calamity Sprint!
missions.johnson_valley.timeTrial.dunera: Find your way to the checkpoints as fast as you can!
Run this open desert event where you just need to get to the checkpoints as fast as you can, with no set route.
missions.johnson_valley.aiRace.baja1.des: Show the locals how it's done!
missions.johnson_valley.aiRace.baja1.sta: The locals like this spot for baja style sprint racing. Show them how it's done!
missions.johnson_valley.timeTrial.rally2: A high speed offroad time trail with a long straight and technical sections.
Can you handle the speed of this course? Of course you can!
Well done, can you go faster?
missions.gridmapv2.climbforlife.title: A Climb For Life
missions.gridmapv2.climbforlife.descript: To arrive up the hill, a sturdy machine is a must. Grab a four wheel-drive and heavy vehicle because there is no way to avoid all of the falling debris
missions.gridmapv2.climbforlife.startScr: Drive up the hill and avoid as many debris as possible!
missions.gridmapv2.survival.title: A Run For Life
missions.gridmapv2.survival.startScreen:
A bunch of obstacles will come your way, some are to be avoided, but others are to be jumped over, bumped into or crashed through to earn extra points! The good ones will be marked with green arrows, so you know where to aim for!

You can also try to keep your vehicle at the top of the screen to get even more points.

Now be careful, if your vehicle falls out of the screen, you won't get much time to get back in before exploding!

If you come across blue circles, these are coins! Drive over them to unlock a repair buff.

Good luck!
missions.gridmapv2.survival.description: Bring your own vehicle in this never-ending scenario. The question isn't whether your vehicle will be wrecked, but when. How long can you last for? In this scenario you'll have to keep avoiding the never-ending flow of obstacles
missions.gridmapv2.survival.wood: Perhaps your vehicle isn't suited for this kind of challenge. Maybe try to take a heavier vehicle with 4 wheel drive.
missions.gridmapv2.survival.bronze: This medal is already a bit difficult to reach. Now try taking even more bonuses!
missions.gridmapv2.survival.silver: Almost there! Now you just need to practice more
missions.gridmapv2.survival.gold: Perfect! Well, your vehicle is still good for the junkyard
missions.drift.general.wrongWayFail: It is not authorized to go back up the drift course.
missions.drift.general.driftTips: In order to initiate a drift, while steering left or right, either pull the handbrake for a split second or with a RWD, accelerate. Once the slide is initiated, smoothly use the steering and the gas pedal in order to control the car's angle.
missions.drift.general.outOfTime: You have run out of time, you need to reach the destination in order to have a chance to qualify.
missions.drift.general.title: Minimalistic Gymkhana
missions.drift.general.startScreenBeginn:
Your goal is to earn as many points as possible.

To get points:

  • Drift with a big angle
  • Drift close to the walls
  • Chain together drifts to increase combo
  • Don't crash!
missions.drift.general.driftConfirm: The points earned during a drift will be applied once you have completed the slide without collision.
missions.drift.general.startScreenBonusP: There are some specific rules for this run :
This particular challenge judges slide points only with no additional bonuses.
missions.drift.general.startScreenTimeDr: You will get additional time when you complete a drift
missions.drift.general.startScreenDonut: There is a dedicated donut area where you can earn bonus points.
missions.drift.general.startScreenPerpDr: There is a tight-drift area where you'll be rewarded with bonus points for drifting through a tight spot.
missions.drift.general.startScreenTarget: You must finish the course in order to qualify.
This is Gymkhana mode. Which means there's no defined route to follow. Use the available bounds to score as many points as you can, in any direction that you choose.
missions.drift.general.noMedal: Drifting is difficult. If you keep practicing you will surely make it to the podium. Make sure to take advantage of all options to get more points.
missions.drift.general.bronze: That's somewhere to start! You managed to get those tires screeching!
missions.drift.general.silver: That was a great drifting session, you really know how to handle the car. Some more practice and you'll get the gold!
missions.drift.general.gold: Very nice run there! To reach the gold medal, you pretty much need to do a flawless session. You managed to do that, so well done! That was some impressive handling.
missions.drift.general.platinium: Perfect run, nothing to add. This course has no more secrets for you.
missions.cannon.general.explain: {{up}} and {{down}} will adjust the cannon elevations, fire by using {{fire}}. Switch to the next cannon using {{switch}}. For lateral aiming, you will have to drive the cannon.
missions.cannon.general.introMedalsDestr:
Scores:

  • Gold : {{goldScore}} destroyed targets.
  • Silver : {{silverScore}} destroyed targets.
  • Bronze: {{bronzeScore}} destroyed targets.
missions.cannon.general.stopTargets: You have to stop the targets to win
missions.cannon.general.win: You have stopped every target! Well done!
missions.cannon.general.caught: You got too close to one of the targets and they saw you!

missions.cannon.general.silver: This was interesting, almost a full wipe-out!
missions.cannon.general.gold: Well done, you got gold. Can't do any better.

missions.italy.001.title: Rooftop Shooting
missions.italy.001.description: Not a straight forward point-and-shoot cannon challenge!
missions.italy.001.intro:
If you can reach the gold medal in the first try, well done! This challenge is not only about being able to hit the targets.
Good luck!
missions.crawl.general.introTipsPointsAn:
Your goal is to reach the end of the course and to get the least penalty points. You start with 0 penalty points, and gain points for the following infractions:
  • Using reverse: +1 point
  • Touching a prop: +5 points
  • Rollover or damaging the vehicle: +5 points
  • Using a recovery checkpoint: +10 points
  • Leaving the area: +10 points

      • If you leave the area for 5 seconds, you will fail the challenge.
      Reaching a [color=#ffff00][b]yellow checkpoint [/color][/b] will create a new recovery position and subtract 10 penalty points. Use [action=reset_physics] or the Menu to recover to your latest recovery position. You can restart the challenge by resetting again after recovery, or using the Menu.
missions.crawl.general.introTipsPointsOn:
Your goal is to reach the end of the course and to get the least penalty points. You start with 0 penalty points, and gain points for the following infractions:
  • Using reverse: +1 point
  • Touching a prop: +5 points
  • Rollover or damaging the vehicle: +5 points
  • Leaving the area: +10 points

      • If you leave the area for 5 seconds, you will fail the challenge.
missions.crawl.general.introTipsRecovery:
Your goal is to reach the end of the crawling course. If you leave the area for 5 seconds, you will fail the challenge.
Reaching a [color=#ffff00][b]yellow checkpoint [/color][/b] will create a new recovery position. Use [action=reset_physics] or the Menu to recover to your latest recovery position. You can restart the challenge by resetting again after recovery, or using the Menu.
missions.crawl.general.introTipsNoPoints: Your goal is to reach the end of the crawling course. If you leave the area for 5 seconds, you will fail the challenge.
missions.crawl.general.resetFull: Out of Bounds! Press [action=reset_physics] to restart the challenge.
missions.crawl.general.resetCheckpoint: Out of Bounds! Press [action=reset_physics] to reset back to your last [color=#ffff00][b]Recovery Checkpoint[/color][/b].
missions.crawl.general.restart: Reset again to restart the race.

missions.crawl.general.checkpoint: You reached a checkpoint! Penalty points reduced by 10.
missions.crawl.starOutroTexts.noStarUnlo: You tried. With some more practice, you can do it!

missions.utah.cannon003.title: Pigeons on the Roof
missions.utah.cannon003.description: Clear the roof of the annoying pigeons.
missions.utah.cannon003.intro: Those darn birds are on my roof again! Time to take them down once and for all! There's 4 of them, but I have only 3 cannons..
missions.italy.drift007.title: Village Drift
missions.italy.drift007.description: One of the most difficult drift route, (not the most legal one either). It will require you to have perfect control over your vehicle so you don't hit the curbs.
missions.italy.crawl001.title: Beach Crawling
missions.italy.crawl001.description: A nice crawl on the beach in perfect weather. Make sure to pack a snorkel.
missions.italy.crawl001.startScreen: How about getting a tan on the beach? In a crawler? I know it sounds perfect. I found you a nice trail there. It's going to be a pretty chill trail. Apart from the beginning perhaps. But anyway, don't forget your sunscreen!
missions.gridmapv2.drift001.description: You have 60 seconds to get as many points as possible in a defined zone
missions.derby.timeTrial.Figure.title: Figure 8
missions.west_coast_usa.evade.escape.des: Choose from three cars to take the loot, get away and make the drop.
missions.west_coast_usa.evade.escape.sta: Get away from the constabulary then take the loot and drop it off at the cash stash.
missions.west_coast_usa.evade.escape.hid: You need to lose the cops first!
missions.west_coast_usa.evade.escape.dro: Drop done, now get out of here and lose the tail!
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.gm_racetest.de: A short series of small jumps.
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.training_drift: This scenario allows you to develop your drifting skills.

scenarios.hirochi_raceway.dialog_test.de: Altered Training Part 2 to do a proof of concept for dialogs.
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.intro_shortcir: The smaller configuration of Hirochi Raceway.
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.ai_race.title: AI Race Test
scenarios.hirochi_raceway.forgotten_race: A race through the service roads surrounding the track

scenarios.hirochi_raceway.crawl_long.des: Attempt the long version of the rock crawling course. Be sure to make use of the gearbox and differentials if your vehicle has them!
missions.hirochi_raceway.crawl001.title: Hirochi Crawl
missions.hirochi_raceway.crawl001.descri: The main crawl course of Hirochi. This one is not too long, and not too risky. However you can easily tip yourself over.
missions.hirochi_raceway.crawl001.startS:
Welcome!

This course is around 10 minutes long, a bit technical but not so much!

Have fun!
missions.hirochi_raceway.drift.Pro.title: Drift exhibition
missions.hirochi_raceway.drift.Pro.descr: Take on the championship drift stage at Hirochi Raceway.
missions.hirochi_raceway.drift.Pro.starO: Great run keep trying and go for the gold!
Drifting can take a while to get the hang of, keep trying.
missions.hirochi_raceway.timeTrial.forgo: A Race through the access roads surrounding Hirochi Raceway. Previously part of the circuit layout, these roads are now lined with hazardous trees and power poles.
Another Race through the access roads surrounding Hirochi Raceway. Previously part of the circuit layout, these roads are now lined with hazardous trees and power poles.
missions.hirochi_raceway.timeTrial.short: The shorter configuration of the Hirochi Raceway. More suitable for lower powered vehicles.
missions.hirochi_raceway.timeTrial.mediu: The medium configuration of the Hirochi Raceway. Features a tight chicane.
missions.hirochi_raceway.timeTrial.longc: The longer configuration of the Hirochi Raceway. More suitable for higher powered vehicles.
missions.hirochi_raceway.drift.grandopen: Score as many points using the entire race facility.
missions.drift.west_coast_usa.bridge.des: We placed custom bumpers on your vehicle so the damages don't come up to be too expensive. You only have to drift through one tight bend.
missions.drift.west_coast_usa.bridge.tip: If you are using the default vehicle, be gentle with the throttle. This vehicle tends to oversteer quickly.
missions.drift.west_coast_usa.mountWalli: Long drift session along the smooth turns of the mountain roads!
scenarios.Industrial.pessima_autocross.d: Try out the Ibishu Pessima ZX with All-Wheel Steering. You'll be taking it through a handling course that requires great maneuverability.
scenarios.Industrial.autocrosstest.title: Autocross Test
scenarios.Industrial.industrial_jump_lar: Take an Ibishu Covet rally car on a flying journey over a series of raised platforms.
scenarios.Industrial.industrial_long_jum: Drive an Ibishu Covet rally car for 2 laps of a course featuring some long distance jumps.
scenarios.industrial.kingSize.title: King Size
scenarios.industrial.kingSize.descriptio:
We need you to.. retrieve some mattresses in a near-by location. Don't be fooled by their appearance, we were told the previous owner hid quite a sum of cash inside of them!

Drive to the location, find the van and bring it back!
scenarios.industrial.kingSize.search: Search the area for the van!
scenarios.industrial.kingSize.shed: The van is inside that shed! Break in with your vehicle!
scenarios.industrial.kingSize.shed2: Now exit your vehicle, and steal the van!
scenarios.industrial.kingSize.shed4: Quick, now get out of here!
scenarios.industrial.kingSize.mattressLo: Slow down! The mattresses are falling off the trailer!
scenarios.industrial.kingSize.mattressTi: The mattresses are not tied down! Don't drive too fast, or they will fall off!
scenarios.industrial.kingSize.winDescrip: Thanks for 'retrieving' these mattresses.. What are all these stains?
You lost the mattresses in the trailer, but we still have the others from the van..
scenarios.industrial.kingSize.failDescri: You did not escape in time..
scenarios.industrial.portEscape.title: Port Escape
scenarios.industrial.portEscape.descript:
There is no time to explain! You must leave the area as quick as possible!

Reach the ferry boat at the dock!
Excellent driving, that was a thrilling escape!
Good driving, although you could have been faster..
scenarios.industrial.portEscape.waterFai: Your vehicle is sleeping with the fishes..
missions.industrial.barrelKnocker.title: Barrel Knocker
missions.industrial.barrelKnocker.descri:
I done put some barrels 'round the dirt road! This dern truck can't carry a tune in a bucket, so pull up your britches and get fixin' to go knock all'em barrels down! I reckon you got a minute or so.

Mind you don't get all tore up, them nasty barrels is also hidin' in the swamp and them gosh dang bushes! No rubber-neckin' just get'r done!
missions.industrial.barrelKnocker.result: You done got'em all, darn tootin! That was like herdin' cats!
You got a real hankerin' for this! I reckon you mash that gas and skedaddle you's might just beat that one minute mark I mentioned!
Looks like them barrels is better at hidin' then y'all is at findin'!
missions.industrial.drift001.title: Port Drift
missions.industrial.drift001.description: Tight corners, patches of grass, potholes, this route has everything to ruin your run, and your vehicle. Take it slow for the first run so you can map it out.
missions.industrial.drift002.title: Gymkhana
missions.industrial.drift002.description: An area filled with obstacles all to yourself where you can show off your drifting skills, and 60 seconds, you know the drill : It's Gymkhana. All of that is abandoned so don't worry about anyone bothering you. Go crazy.
missions.italy.timeTrial.peak.title: Peak Performance
missions.italy.timeTrial.peak.descriptio: A mixed surface circuit at the top of a hill.
missions.italy.timeTrial.peak.startScree: This course is not for the faint of heart. Are you scared of heights?
missions.italy.timeTrial.peak.endScreenT: Great job! You are at peak performance!
missions.italy.drift001.title: Slithery Drift
missions.italy.drift001.description: The road is very narrow and will require you to be precise with your controls.
missions.italy.drift001.noMedal: This road isn't easy. You will need several tries to get a good score, keep it up!
missions.italy.drift001.bronze: At least you made it to the end, now run for the gold!
missions.italy.drift001.silver: That was close from the gold, keep trying and remember to take risks.
missions.italy.drift001.gold: That's genuinely impressive, the gold medal is proportionally harder to reach. You have mastered this run, very well done
missions.italy.drift006.title: Slithery Drift (Short)
missions.italy.drift006.description: This route is a shortened version of the same but longer, more difficult 'Slithery Drift'. The road is narrow and you are going to have to be accurate with your steering and pedals.
missions.italy.drift002.title: Inconvenient Drift
missions.italy.drift002.description: You have to drift down the mountain and arrive within time. The road is tricky, so mind your speed
missions.italy.drift003.title: Airport Gymkhana
missions.italy.drift003.description: You have an open area all to yourself on an airfield along with 60 seconds to show off your drifting skills.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_pessima: Race around the coast of Jungle Rock Island in the Ibishu Pessima Custom.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_ds_320_: Take the Civetta Bolide 320 where it was never meant to go.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.intro_jri_m: A race over the volcano on Jungle Rock Island.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_rally_p: Tough dirt rally ending at the port.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.intro_jri_r: A race around the entire island.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.drag_race.d: Enter a drag race on an abandoned air strip with your Gavril Barstow drag car. To win, you will have to shift on your own and time your start precisely.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_deliver: Deliver a new Gavril T-Series Cement Mixer to the local port.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_shortcu: Thrash your Gavril Grand Marshal up a muddy washout between roads, then turn around and come back. Remember, it's only a shortcut if you survive it.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.hypermiling: Get to the airstrip with only a drop of fuel left in the tank. Can you make it in the highly efficient Ibishu Pessima HX?
You got stuck or ran out of fuel
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_portsha: Take a heavily modified Sunburst through a wild time trial at the abandoned port. Get that vehicle rotating around the obstacles for the best time.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_chase.d: Chase down a fleeing Gavril H15 using your trusty old Ibishu Covet.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_drown_t: Help the defenseless little yellow Ibishu Pigeon survive through multiple puddles of water.
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_moose.d: A classic emergency lane change test, made to showcase a vehicle's handling stability. For this test you'll be using a Hirochi Sunburst RS
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_moose.s: Too slow, you didn't enter at 75km/h or higher
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.jri_moose.t: Too slow, you used more than {{timeLimit}} seconds to get to the checkpoint
scenarios.jungle_rock_island.intro_jri_h: A hillclimb up the volcano on the island.
Hello and welcome to our safari tour around jungle rock island! [br] I'm Claire, and I will guide you through this tour. Please take a seat - we are leaving shortly. [br][br] Hi! Could you please take the wheel? I'll be busy explaining things and pointing out animals. Don't worry, it's super easy. Take your time and just follow the waypoints. [br] Oh, and please don't drive us of a cliff.
Nicely done! I think most people liked the tour. The cardboard animals even got some laughs! Need a summer job?
Ouch! How am I supposed to admire the animals when you are driving like this?
scenarios.port.port_container_race.title: Port Container Trial
scenarios.port.port_container_race.descr: Make it through a tricky course on top of shipping containers. This off-road spec Gavril D15 has just enough turning radius if you plan your moves correctly.
scenarios.small_island.cop_chase.title: Small Island Chase
scenarios.small_island.cop_chase.descrip: Neutralize the Pessima with your Sunburst police car.
scenarios.small_island.hopping_around.de: Drive cross country from checkpoint to checkpoint in an Ibishu Hopper Custom.
scenarios.small_island.intro_rally_stage: A point to point rally stage.
A point to point rally stage.
Find your own way to an abandoned structure, then to the top of the mountain. Play it safe by taking the roads, or go cross country for a shorter path. You'll be driving a Gavril Roamer.
scenarios.small_island.intro_round_circu: Drive the Ibishu 200BX LS around the island loop course as fast as you can.
scenarios.small_island.cannon001.title: A Break
scenarios.small_island.cannon001.descrip: Be accurate and destroy the green bastion from afar. Make sure not to damage any of the other cars.
scenarios.small_island.cannon001.intro: You see that green Bastion surrounded with cars? You have to destroy it while avoiding any damage on any of the other cars.
scenarios.utah.canyon_race.title: Canyon Race
scenarios.utah.canyon_race.description: A long run around the canyons and lowlands of Utah
scenarios.utah.canyon_jump.title: Canyon Jump
scenarios.utah.canyon_jump.description: Land some massive jumps across the unique geological formations of Utah. You'll be behind the wheel of an off-road spec Gavril H15.
scenarios.utah.canyon_jump.fail.msg: You did not complete all the jumps
scenarios.utah.downhill_rally.title: Downhill Rally
scenarios.utah.downhill_rally.descriptio: Try out the ETK-I rally car on a mixed stage across Utah.
scenarios.utah.chapter_1.chapter_1_bridg: Attempt to drive across a rickety bridge during a dust storm.
scenarios.utah.chapter_1.chapter_1_canno: Use a powerful old cannon to destroy an old rusty vehicle.

Launch your vehicle off a large jump and try to flatten the target.
