levels.west_coast_usa.info.description: Explore the West Coast of the USA. Representative of various locations in California.
level.west_coast_usa.info.logbookEntry:
West Coast, USA

The beautiful and sunny Belasco City is situated on the West Coast of the USA and gives visitors an excellent opportunity to experience a coastal city with a small-town vibe. Belasco City boasts a world-class motorsports park, dockyards, logistics and industrial areas, nation-leading aggregates facilities, movie-studios, beaches, a sprawling downtown core with a bustling Chinatown, as well as lovely residential and forested areas; Belasco City offers almost everything the burgeoning explorer needs for a great time.
levels.west_coast_usa.info.features: Belasco City, Racing Complex, Redwood Forest, Suburbs, Highways, River Channel, Dockyards
levels.west_coast_usa.spawnpoints.indust: At the outskirts of the city, here you can find mechanics, diners and construction companies.

The Industrial Area

Situated on the outskirts of Belasco City, and half-abandoned by the industry giants that once made the area their home, the Industrial area is now home to mechanics, diners, and more construction companies than one can shake rebar at.

With architecture that is a charming mix of the old-fashioned and the modern, this area rewards exploration with fascinating sights and intriguing locations. Why does that building look like it just barely escaped having a view of Central Park? Why does that diner look like it came from outer space? Did the diner come from outer space?
levels.west_coast_usa.spawnpoints.chinat: With its winding road, this is definitely a nice area.

Chinatown

Established in 1859, Belasco Citys colorful Chinatown district has long been an integral part of the city's culture. This charming area is rife with hidden side streets and interesting little shops. With all of its hills, winding streets, and interesting scenery, Chinatown is a joy to explore.

The local Neighborhood Association would like to welcome drivers to beautiful Chinatown and encourage everyone to take advantage of our lovely amenities! We would also like to remind drivers to exercise caution at all times while driving in Chinatown. The Association does not take responsibility for any damages caused by reckless driving, including property damage, concussions, being covered in noodles, loss of limb, or death.
levels.west_coast_usa.spawnpoints.dockya: Lots of space and big hangars for cargo.

The Dockyards

The Dockyards have been on the decline since heavy industry started leaving Belasco City in the early 2000s. With suddenly-empty warehouses bought up and quickly abandoned by real estate magnates hoping for a boom, but instead going bust, this spacious area is perfect for experimenting with off-hours driving techniques.

The resident dockyard security company warns trespassers that access to the Dockyards is by appointment only, and no appointments are available at night. Visitors are not allowed to race, explore or lollygag at the Dockyards. Please note that the city takes no responsibility for any injuries, damages, or deaths that may occur while trespassing in this area.
levels.west_coast_usa.spawnpoints.dirttr: A Figure-8 course with a jump and high fences.

The Dirt Track

For those drivers who long for country dirt roads with some extra excitement, the Dirt Track's figure-8 style dirt course, primarily fenced in and complete with a track-crossing high-jump, might be just what they're looking for. This track is ideal for testing off-road vehicles and offers an exciting challenge for those who are tired of tarmac.

Management would like to remind visitors that pedestrians are not allowed on the track under any circumstances.
levels.west_coast_usa.spawnpoints.redwoo: Relax in this foresty area away from the city.

The Redwood Forest

The Redwood Forest is a protected natural forest southwest of Belasco City. This forest is rife with ancient trees some more than 400 years old! and stunning scenery. Drive around and relax as you drive along the winding roads through the trees away from the city.

The Redwood Park Services would like to remind visitors that littering is Strictly Prohibited. Please ensure that you are not in the forest overnight; Redwood Park Services will not take responsibility if you are eaten by a bear.
levels.west_coast_usa.spawnpoints.highwa: Right next to the tollbooth, you're ready to go.

The Highway

The Highway is a gorgeous construction, truly epitomizing the modern era. With state of the art tollbooths and up-to-the-minute engineering, this area is excellent for exploration, and of course the most efficient way to get from A to B.

The Port Authority of Belasco began collecting tolls to enter the city in 1946. Back then, it was only 50 cents! To this day, nobody knows where the money goes.
levels.west_coast_usa.spawnpoints.racetr: The central race track of the area.

Belasco Motorsports Park

Belasco Motorsports Park (B.M.P.) is a versatile and accommodating motorsports playground. Built in 1953, B.M.P. has since hosted some of the world's biggest races. With multiple layouts, dirt tracks, and a drag strip, redesigns and renovations over the years have helped the park keep up with modern times.

Belasco Motorsports Ltd would like to remind visitors that pedestrians are not allowed on the track under any circumstances, at any time, and they take no responsibility for damages, death, or loss of limb that may occur during visitors use of the facilities. Please make sure to validate your parking.
levels.west_coast_usa.spawnpoints.dragst: Inside the motorsports area, a long and straight track piece to reach high speeds.

The Drag Strip

Running almost the length of Belasco Motorsports Park, the drag strip is an ideal place to test your vehicle's acceleration and straight-line speed. This long, straight piece of track lets drivers put their reaction time and their vehicle's power to the test.

The site of the infamous 1964 BHRA finals, where Stu Leonard lost control of Bad BuBu and flipped into the crowd. We would like to take this opportunity to remind visitors that the 1964 BHRA Finals proceeded smoothly and with no trouble whatsoever. Any rumors of track ownership opting to cover up the incident rather than to improve safety after this event are false, and rumormongers should be reported to the relevant authorities.
levels.west_coast_usa.spawnpoints.logist: Shuffleboard Logistics, a commercial vehicle garage in the small industrial area outside of town.

The Logistics Area

A smaller industrial section wedged between downtown and Belasco Motorsports Park, The logistics area has a number of abandoned and graffitied warehouses. This otherwise small industrial zone offers opportunity in large to land yourself, and your vehicle, in some serious trouble with the law.

Shuffleboard Logistics & Distribution would like to remind drivers that their parking lot is not a racetrack, and will not be held liable for any damages, disturbances, or lost packages that may occur as a result of non-authorized drivers use of these facilities.
levels.west_coast_usa.spawnpoints.servic: With a fuel station and garage, this has everything you need while taking a break from driving.

The Service Station

This Trilobite location has everything a weary driver could possibly need; Fuel pumps, ATMs, and a small snack shop help refuel both vehicles and drivers alike.

Trilobite Service Stations would like guests to know that these fuel prices are absolutely normal, and nothing to worry about. Please don't ask to use the restrooms.
levels.west_coast_usa.spawnpoints.refine:
Oil Refinery

A large oil refinery complete with various processing units and a marine terminal.
levels.west_coast_usa.spawnpoints.quarry: Rocks and gravel roads make this area great for rock crawling or offroad driving.

The Quarry

Located just outside of the Redwoods Forest, the Belasco Materials Company-owned quarry provides crushed stone, sand and gravel and is indispensable to infrastructure and growth in the area.

Established in 1999, this quarry remains one of the main employers in the area. While the site remains open for business, it has also become a popular location for impromptu motorsports events. This multi-level quarry has several tricky jumps and hazards including a body of water just waiting to swallow your vehicle - and offers opportunities to challenge new drivers and veterans alike.

The Belasco Materials Company would like to remind any would-be enthusiasts that use of the Quarry for racing or otherwise is strictly prohibited. Entry is at your own risk, and the company takes no responsibility for any injuries or damages that may occur.

You are about to perform a Deep Cache cleaning!

Only mods and custom configurations will be preserved. Anything else will be moved into a backup folder.

The process can take a few minutes, depending on the size of your Userfolder.

ui.options.graphics.vulkanEnabled.warnin: Vulkan renderer is an early work in progress: it can crash to desktop, blue-screen your computer or reboot it. If that happens use Safe Mode. Test at your own risk!
ui.career.adventurer.name: Adventurer
ui.career.adventurer.description: From daring stunt jumps, to speed traps and other highly-reckless activities, the Adventurer Branch offers menacing intensity, drama, and an innate danger that keeps players coming back for more.
ui.career.adventurer.control.name: Control
ui.career.adventurer.control.description: The Control Skill is all about precision maneuvers.
ui.career.adventurer.destruction.name: Destruction
ui.career.adventurer.destruction.descrip: In the Destruction Skill, you'll be turning and shiny cars into heaps of scrap.
ui.career.adventurer.jumping.name: Jumping
ui.career.adventurer.jumping.description: Reach new heights and reach new distances in the Jumping Skill.
ui.career.adventurer.havoc.name: Havoc Mode
ui.career.adventurer.havoc.description: Coming soon: Unleash chaos in Havoc Mode, a premium game feature where destruction meets adrenaline. Using bonus stars for access, players race through the streets causing mayhem, from crashing into vehicles to outrunning police, all while building combo scores for extended play and unlocking explosive abilities. This mode challenges players to create chaos, offering retries for newcomers and bonus loot access, ensuring every player gets to experience the thrill of havoc.
ui.career.adventurer.miniGames.name: Mini Games
ui.career.adventurer.miniGames.descripti: Coming soon: Embark on a thrilling journey through a dynamic collection of driving and crashing challenges, including Vehicular Darts, Vehicular Soccer, and more, tailored for players seeking action-packed vehicle gameplay. With possibilities for continuous expansion, this game mode offers exciting objectives and a diverse array of vehicles, ensuring a unique blend of strategy, skill, and chaos with every play.
ui.career.adventurer.criminal.name: Criminal Activities
ui.career.adventurer.derbies.name: Crash Derbies
ui.career.adventurer.derbies.description: Coming soon: Rev up for a thrilling ride through destruction derby style rampage, where players climb the ranks from battling in basic arenas to mastering vehicular combat against larger, meaner opponents amidst a chaotic backdrop of jumps, hazards, and more. From honing collision tactics in Collision Course to surviving the ultimate Last Car Standing Championship, gear up for an adrenaline-pumping journey to earn trophy vehicles for Havoc Mode and more, where strategy, skill, and sheer will to survive dictate your path to victory.
ui.career.labourer.name: Laborer
ui.career.labourer.description: Whether you're interested in vehicle recovery, delivering heavy machinery, cargo, or people; the Laborer Branch offers a wide variety of fulfilling-yet-daunting task-oriented challenges to overcome.
ui.career.labourer.delivery.name: Cargo Delivery
ui.career.labourer.delivery.description: Progress through five levels of delivery gameplay, starting with small packages and advancing to complex fluid transport using large tanker trailers. Each level introduces new challenges, from navigating with trailers to managing hazardous materials.
ui.career.labourer.vehicleDelivery.name: Car Jockey
ui.career.labourer.vehicleDelivery.descr: Advance through five levels within Car Jockey gameplay, starting with delivering low-value junker vehicles to perfecting the art of transporting exotic and high-value vehicles. Each level upscales the challenge, from maintaining the condition of used vehicles to ensuring the pristine delivery of new and exotic cars.
ui.career.labourer.towing.name: Towing
ui.career.labourer.towing.description: Coming soon: Embark on a journey from rescuing stranded vehicles to owning a thriving tow truck empire in the immersive Towing gameplay. Progress through levels, upgrading your fleet to handle everything from normal tows to the heavy-duty challenges of transporting tankers and hazardous materials, all while navigating procedural missions for endless engaging opportunities.
ui.career.labourer.taxi.name: Taxi
ui.career.labourer.taxi.description: Coming soon: Navigate the bustling streets, starting as a rookie driver learning the ropes of urban navigation to becoming a Taxi Mogul with your own fleet. Progress through levels mastering customer service, adapting to varied fare requests, and evading pursuers, all towards the ultimate goal of owning the taxi company. Along the way, enjoy the transition from fulfilling specific passenger needs to strategic company management, where you can earn 100% profit and hire any vehicle for taxi service, including your own, for passive income.
ui.career.motorsport.name: Motorsports
ui.career.motorsport.description: The passion of racing against the clock and opponents on the drag-strip, race track, city streets, and offroad is undeniably alluring. The Motorsports Branch tests your skills through various challenges.
ui.career.motorsport.crawl.name: Rock Crawling
ui.career.motorsport.crawl.description: Now: Take your driving to the extreme and tackle natural and artificial obstacle courses. Coming soon: Ascend through the ranks of the Rock Crawling Skill Progression, starting with mastering the basics of navigating rugged terrains to tackling the ultimate challenge of timed hill climbs. Each level elevates your skills, from maneuvering through simple rock formations to conquering custom-designed courses and steep, demanding ascents, all demanding precision, control, and strategic planning.
ui.career.motorsport.drift.name: Drifting
ui.career.motorsport.drift.description: Earn points by sliding your vehicle sideways along a predefined course or open area.
ui.career.motorsport.racing.name: Racing
ui.career.motorsport.racing.description: Achieve first-place standings against AI competitors and establish yourself as a foremost race car driver.
ui.career.motorsport.timeTrial.name: Time Trials
ui.career.motorsport.timeTrial.descripti: Race against the clock to set the best times and highest scores.
ui.career.motorsport.apex.name: Apex Racing
ui.career.motorsport.apex.description: Now: Race against the clock and AI opponents. Coming soon: Discover the ultimate racing journey where every tier unlocks a new realm of competition, from Time Trials and Drag Racing to the endurance-testing challenges of long-distance racing. Dive into the strategic depth of using personal vehicles, rewarding your investment and customization skills with higher rewards. This comprehensive racing career will ensure continuous engagement, while rewarding mastery and personalization at every turn.
ui.career.motorsport.legacy.name: Legacy Racing
ui.career.motorsport.legacy.description: Embark on a timeless racing journey with 'Through the Decades,'' where you'll start behind the wheel of classic vehicles and accelerate through history to modern-day marvels. Each tier will challenge you with iconic cars and evolving courses, inviting you to master the art of racing across eras, from the elegance of the classics to the raw power of millennium milestones.
ui.career.specialized.name: Specialized
ui.career.specialized.description: From action-packed police operations and emergency rescues to highly specialized and exclusive deliveries and escorts, the Specialized Branch offers players a chance to step into the big leagues and thrive.
ui.career.specialized.criminal.name: Criminal
ui.career.specialized.criminal.descripti: Now: Evade the police and reach your hideout in time. Coming soon: Step into the shadowy world of Criminal Activities gameplay, where you navigate the adrenaline-fueled life of a lawbreaker. From high-stakes getaway missions to audacious vehicle heists, test your skills in evading the police, mastering vehicle theft, and pulling off daring robberies, all while climbing the ranks to become the ultimate criminal mastermind.
ui.career.specialized.police.name: Police
ui.career.specialized.police.description: Chase after and stop criminals to preserve the rule of law.
ui.career.specialized.enforcement.name: Law Enforcement
ui.career.specialized.enforcement.descri: Now: Chase after and stop criminals to preserve the rule of law. Coming soon: Beginning with EVOC training, players gain foundational police driving skills necessary for high-speed chases and emergency situations, advancing through more complex techniques and a broader selection of police vehicles with a mix of practical and theoretical learning. Progressing through Law Enforcement ranks unlocks further levels of EVOC training and access to an extensive vehicle lineup, eventually achieving the 'Bounty Hunter' status, which allows for personalized vehicle selection and more independent challenge engagement.
ui.career.specialized.paramedics.name: Paramedics
ui.career.specialized.paramedics.descrip: Coming soon: Embark on a journey from mastering the basics of ambulance navigation to becoming a veteran in life-saving missions with our upcoming Paramedic gameplay. Rise through the ranks, unlock specialized rescue skills, and face challenges that will test your limits and define your legacy as a hero on the streets.
ui.career.specialized.privateSecurity.de: Coming soon: Dive into the high-stakes world of secure transport with our upcoming gameplay, where you'll navigate the thrilling demands of VIP Transport, Convoy Escort, and more. Experience the adrenaline of protecting high-profile clients, valuable assets, and even prisoners, against chases and attacks, ensuring safety through every twist and turn.
ui.career.specialized.stunt.name: Stunt Driver
ui.career.specialized.stunt.description: Coming soon: Launch into the thrill-packed career of a stunt driver, starting as a rookie and climbing the ranks to become a renowned stunt icon in blockbuster Lens Flare Studios productions. Master a variety of high-octane challenges, from precision driving to daring stunts, while earning fame and honing your skills in a dynamic world of cinematic adrenaline and stunt showcases.
ui.career.landingPage.name: Progress
ui.career.landingPage.description: Track your progression through the game's main branches and their specific skills. Delve into each branch and plan your path toward expertise in your preferred driving style.
